name: Sign Here
description:
(if the game doesn't work on itch.io directly, you can try the web version here)

Sign Here

Show off your powerworking skills!

The workload at your new office job is overwhelming, and you have to coordinate writing and moving your draft paper to avoid writing onto the documents!

  • Mouse-Input Only
  • Jam version made for the GMTK-GameJam 2021
  • (First-time submission)

Control

Move the pen - Mouse position
Move draft paper/ doodles - Left click while on the draft paper

Credits

Malte Jürgens - Programming
Christian Müller - Asset Design
Dima - Soundtrack (made before jam)

Thanks to

Moritz Hanke, Toni Hui Thai Ahan, Ole Finn for inspiration and advice.
Special thanks to all the players for playing our game.
